title: Bark At The Moon

description: Tried to add pulloffs for the main riff, Jake does pulloffs on the recording and picks it in the clinic. He would change it up live. Other than that everything is how Jake plays it.
title: Bark At The Moon

description: Few minor changes to the solo
title: Bark At The Moon

description:
Please stop changing the tab, the way it was was the correct way to play it.

The chords in bars 5, 13 and 15 are the way JAKE E LEE himself explained how to play them in a guitar clinic he played. Here is the link to the video so you stop changing the chords: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2akLS8kmRjU&ab_channel=MarkStoddard

The main solo was correct the way it was so please stop reverting it the the way the tab book has it

Finally the outro solo was also correct the way it was. There are "easier" ways to play it but Jake wrote it to be played that way for tonality reasons, you can refer to the linked video above to see JAKE E LEE explain how the outro is played
title: Bark At The Moon

description:
Please stop changing this tab back to the "official tab book" the official tab book is wrong.

The chord stabs that I have tabbed out are the ones that JAKE E LEE himself explained in a guitar clinic.

The solo was right the way it was

And the outro solo was also correct the way it was. I know there are "easier" ways to play it but those positions are the way JAKE plays it
title: Bark At The Moon

description:
ESTE SIM É DE ACORDO COM SOUNDBOOK ORIGINAL:
+Corrigido compasso 5, acorde incorreto. 
+corrigido compasso 13, completamente errado.
+corrigido compasso 15, não é igual a intro.
+Corrigido o compasso 20, pois estava errado.
+Corrigido o compasso 25, não tem whamy bar.
+Corrigido as notas do Pre chorus.
+Corrigido 70% do solo, Jake lee, toca muito mais rápido que tercinas além das notas estarem incorretas.
Solo final corrigido postura.

Obrigado
title: Bark At The Moon
